name: Winter Owls
desc: In Japanese, the words for "owl" and "no hardship" sound similar, which is why owls bring to mind positive concepts. These fluffy winter owls are cute and popular.

name: A Day with Shichi-kun
desc: Shichi-kun works hard every day to promote his beloved Shibuya to everyone. If you want to enjoy Shibuya to the fullest, go on a walk with Shichi-kun.

name: Capy B. Family
desc: Capy B. is the most popular animal in the zoo. Just seeing him and his family enjoying a relaxing time is comforting. He loves taking baths.

name: Queue of 100 Demons
desc: You feel like someone calls you name, but when you turn around, no one is there. Perhaps it's a resident of another world, calling out to you.

name: All-New 4WD Tanks
desc: With their unique characteristics and personalities, these tanks fight to the absolute limit of their abilities in an ever-changing war zone. Who will dominate the battlefield?

name: Shichi-kun's Circus Parade
desc: To help show off how wonderful Shibuya is, Shichi-kun is holding a grand circrus parade! Which of his acts will be your favorite?

name: A Cool Day in Sushi Village
desc: Wrapped in their thick seaweed coats and residing in scrumptious igloos, these sushi rolls are living up their arctic lives as cool as cucumbers.

name: Office Heroes
desc: When trouble strikes, this group of run-of-the-mill office workers morph into the Office Heroes and add saving the day to their to-done list.

name: Costume Party
desc: Capy B. is trying out different looks for a costume party. Which is your favorite?

name: Beast Bots Genesis
desc: A new line of mechsuit models launched by a popular brand known its all-terrain tanks.
